question_text: Which two statements accurately describe DOCSIS and its use in copper-based networks? (Select two)
answer_options: DOCSIS is used to deliver Ethernet directly over fiber lines
DOCSIS modems require F connectors and coaxial cable
DOCSIS supports high-speed data over cable TV infrastructure
DOCSIS is limited to use with RJ45 connectors only
DOCSIS requires analog telephone line filtering
correct_answer: DOCSIS modems require F connectors and coaxial cable
DOCSIS supports high-speed data over cable TV infrastructure
explanation: DOCSIS enables cable modems to transmit data over coaxial cable using F connectors, leveraging the cable TV network for broadband internet.
